State lineage information

Source: R/state_tree_inference.R
state_lineage_info.Rd

State lineage information

Usage

state_lineage_info(state_lineages, ncells, state, barcodes)

Arguments

state_lineages

A named list of state lineage paths (e.g., "L1", "L2", ...).

ncells

Number of cells.

state

A data frame containing cell states (with columns "cluster" and "cell_id").

barcodes

A matrix of lineage barcodes for each cell.

Value

A list with the following elements:

state_lineage

A list indicating which state lineage(s) each cell belongs to.

cell_lineages

A list mapping each state lineage to the corresponding cell IDs.

barcodes_lineages

A list of barcode matrices for cells in each state lineage.

state_labels_lineages

A list of state labels (clusters) for cells in each state lineage.
